ActBank of Canada Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Finance of PAUL G. HAGGIS of Canmore, Alberta, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Bank of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on February 28, 2021.
